note: Author of The Sequence. Hugo nominated for the Astounding Award, 1st place CIBA Global Thriller Award, IPPY Silver Award Medalist for Suspense/Thrillers, CYGNUS Sci-Fi Award longlist. Husband. Father. Aviator. Not necessarily in that order.

fields.name: Author, airline pilot, husband, father, goalie. Not always in this order
fields.value: Thriller scifi books, smooth rides to hot destinations
